Name: DronesTracker
Description: This samples demonstrates how to create a drones tracking application in Security Center.
Requirements: Must have a georeferenced map created in ConfigTool.
If turning a regular image into a georeferenced map, points should be very far apart.
Instructions: After selecting a map, zoom out until a gif of a drone appears on map.
Zoom in to view different mapObjects being tracked.
Result: MapObjects are tracked on the map. Objects should be following the pre-determined paths.
Title: Drones Tracker
